descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]Update![/size][/b]
[b]
[size=3]Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/25504634]DivinityItself[/url] for pointing me out there were Already mods Make Font Clear

Books Notes Paper HD 2K by [b]MacTac
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1618/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1618/?[/url]

Realistic Paper Retexture by [b]FrankFamily[/b] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3819/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3819/?[/url]
[/b][/size][size=3][b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][/b]---------------------------------------------------------------

I will still leave this mod on for my own reference and to people who can't find above mods like me 

And This One is Small file (824kb), only change to book (I hardly read letter/note carefully)

But If you need all paper textures HD

Go to:
[b][size=3]Books Notes Paper HD 2K by [b]MacTac
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1618/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1618/?[/url][/b][/size][/b]
[b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][/b]--------------------------------------------------------------
[/size]
[size=5]Skyrim Book Font Clear V1.0[/size]

[size=5]Features[/size][/b]

[size=3]--Make Skyrim Book Font Clear[/size]
[size=3]--Do not change Font Type/Size/Color[/size]
[size=3]--Just make it Clear[/size]
[size=3]--Not include Letter[/size]
[size=3]-----------------------------------------------------
[/size]
[b][size=5]Description[/size][/b]

[size=3]I love Skryim SE but Skyrim have so much fun mods. So I decided to go back to Skyrim again.[/size]
[size=3]One thing I cannot bear with is the Blurry/Fuzzy Font in Skryim Book. Make me Eye pain[/size]
[size=3]This Mod is aiming to bring back the Font Clear.[/size]
[size=3]So we can enjoy the reading again![/size]
[size=3]-------------------------------------------------------
[/size]
[b][size=5]Installation[/size][/b]

[size=3]--Option1: Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)[/size]
[size=3]--Option2: Extract file to your Skyrim game folder[/size]
author: liweiboi
